Summary: Biochemical reaction from abiraterone to delta4-abiraterone. This interaction can be catalyzed by HSD3B2 or HSD3B1.
Biochemical reaction from abiraterone to abiraterone glucuronide. This interaction is catalyzed by UGT1A4.
Biochemical reaction from abiraterone to abiraterone sulfate. This interaction is catalyzed by SULT2A1.
Biochemical reaction from abiraterone sulfate to n-oxide abiraterone sulfate. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
Transport from abiraterone to abiraterone. This interaction is catalyzed by SLCO2B1.
